title: WTB: Low to mid grade Red Sox tobacco/candy cards!
author: VintageJay

posts.post_title: WTB: Low to mid grade Red Sox tobacco/candy cards!
posts.post_content:
I'm always looking for low to mid grade Boston Americans (Red Sox) tobacco/candy cards.

If you have anything, even trimmed, ripped, etc. please PM me.

Thanks for looking!
